remarks: The natural logarithm of the quotient of two positive real numbers is the difference of natural logarithms.  Exercise 72(a) and Property 3 of [Cohen] p. 301, restricted to natural logarithms.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
statement:
relogcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
relogmuld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
relogdivd $p |- ( ph -> ( log ` ( A / B ) ) = ( ( log ` A ) - ( log ` B ) ) ) $.
